comment: Fantastic fun last night celebrating the launch of the fourth DI Fawley thriller , All The Rage , with Cara and Team Fawley . Feeling quite emotional thinking about how much has happened and what fun we've had in the two years since Close To Home published . <URL>
amr:

comment: So pleased these books continue to grow in popularity . It s the only series of books I ve ever followed because of their originality and the fact I m determined to suss out at least one ending before it kills me .
amr:
